results.name: Rick Sanchez
results.description: An exceptionally gifted, yet deeply troubled scientist with a penchant for chaos. His insatiable thirst for interdimensional exploration is matched only by his self-destructive tendencies and cynical worldview.

results.name: Morty Smith
results.description: A timid, 14-year-old boy who reluctantly joins his eccentric grandfather Rick on bizarre and dangerous intergalactic escapades, often facing his fears and moral dilemmas.

results.name: Summer Smith
results.description: Rick's assertive and sarcastic granddaughter, a high school student who navigates the chaos of interdimensional adventures while trying to balance her teenage life.

results.name: Beth Smith
results.description: A strong-willed and insecure horse surgeon, Rick's daughter, and Morty's mother. She grapples with her complex relationship with Rick while striving to maintain stability in her family's bizarre lifestyle.

results.name: Jerry Smith
results.description: Insecure and inept, he's Beth's husband and Morty's father. Constantly feeling inadequate, Jerry tries to assert his authority but often becomes the family's comedic relief in their sci-fi misadventures.

results.name: Abadango Cluster Princess
results.description: The Abadango Cluster Princess is a regal, powerful, and melodramatic ruler from an alien empire. She gets entangled in Rick and Morty's escapades, showcasing her fierce and extravagant personality.

results.name: Abradolf Lincler
results.description: Abradolf Lincler is a hybrid of Abraham Lincoln and Adolf Hitler, created by Rick. A complex character, torn between good and evil traits, seeking purpose and struggling with identity.

results.name: Adjudicator Rick
results.description: Adjudicator Rick is a stern and authoritative version of Rick, tasked with overseeing interdimensional law and maintaining order across the multiverse. He has no patience for rule-breakers and takes his role seriously.

results.name: Agency Director
results.description: The Agency Director is a high-ranking official in a secretive organization responsible for monitoring and regulating interdimensional activities. They are cunning, manipulative, and always one step ahead in their pursuit of power and control.

results.name: Alan Rails
results.description: Alan Rails is a tough, no-nonsense superhero who possesses the power of summoning ghostly trains. He's a member of the Vindicators, a group of intergalactic superheroes. Alan is determined, stoic, and fiercely loyal to his team.
